Functions

findAngleInTriangle

  • findAngleInTriangle(pointA: Point, pointB: Point, pointC: Point): number
    • Defined in utils.ts:42

    return the angle (in radians) in pointA according to te Al Kashi's theorem α = angleA, β = angleB, γ = angleC a² = b² + c² − 2bc.cos(α) b² = a² + c² − 2ac.cos(β) c² = a² + b² − 2ab.cos(γ)

    method

    findAngleInTriangle

    Parameters

    • pointA: Point
    • pointB: Point
    • pointC: Point

    Returns number

    the angle in pointA
